Based on your preferences and the genres you listed, I would recommend "Winter in Wartime" (2008) directed by Richard Wilson. The movie is set during World War II in Germany and it follows the story of a German boy who becomes involved in the German resistance against the invading English forces led by mortal-converted-god Xerxes.
The movie has an excellent cast including Yorick van Wageningen, Yorick van Waggingenen, Martijn Lakemeier, Tygo Gernandt, Tygo Gernandt. The performances are excellent and it keeps the audience engaged throughout the movie.
Overall, "Winter in Wartime" is a highly recommended movie for anyone who enjoys war movies or period dramas.
